summary: Rainbow/colorful theme modes testing completed successfully. All 10 themes (Light, Dark, Ocean, Sunset, Forest, Lavender, Rose, Midnight, Coral, Mint) are available and functional. Theme selector dropdown works correctly, themes persist after page reload via localStorage, and text visibility is excellent across all themes including dark variants (Ocean, Midnight) and light variants (Sunset, Lavender, Forest, Rose, Coral, Mint).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Rainbow/colorful themes feature fully implemented and tested. 10 themes available: Light, Dark, Ocean, Sunset, Forest, Lavender, Rose, Midnight, Coral, Mint. Theme selector is in the sidebar footer area with data-testid='theme-selector'. Themes are stored in localStorage under 'theme' key. Dark variants: dark, ocean, midnight. Light variants: light, sunset, forest, lavender, rose, coral, mint. CSS variables defined in frontend/src/index.css. ThemeContext.js provides theme state management.

theme_testing_results.all_10_themes_available: PASS - Light, Dark, Ocean, Sunset, Forest, Lavender, Rose, Midnight, Coral, Mint all present in dropdown
theme_testing_results.theme_persistence: PASS - Theme stored in localStorage and persists after page reload
theme_testing_results.ocean_theme_visibility: PASS - Dark variant with deep blue background, light text clearly readable
theme_testing_results.midnight_theme_visibility: PASS - Dark variant with deep purple background, light text clearly readable
theme_testing_results.sunset_theme_visibility: PASS - Light variant with warm orange tones, dark text clearly readable
theme_testing_results.lavender_theme_visibility: PASS - Light variant with soft purple tones, dark text clearly readable
theme_testing_results.sidebar_text_readability: PASS - Navigation sidebar text readable in all tested themes
theme_testing_results.table_data_readability: PASS - Bookings page table data (columns, badges, buttons) readable in all themes
theme_testing_results.buttons_badges_visibility: PASS - Pay, DP Ready, Client Pending, Client Accepted badges visible with good contrast
